rooms.description: A spacious entrance hallway with ramps for wheelchair accessibility.
Vastu-aligned living room focusing on natural light from large windows positioned east and south. Includes wheelchair accessible pathways.
Adjacent to the living room with natural light from the south-facing window.
Modern, functional kitchen designed for ease of movement and accessibility, with windows on the west for ventilation.
State-of-the-art home theater with acoustic design, accessible seating arrangements and soundproofing measures.
Adjacent to kitchen for cleaning supplies; includes a wheelchair-accessible bathroom design.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible with a gentle ramp and automatic door mechanism.
Large windows for natural light and cross ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Enhances ventilation in the kitchen area.
